message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.SI. 

The paper presents a method for smoothing line charts using techniques from Topological Data Analysis. This involves analyzing the shape of the data and identifying prominent peaks using persistent homology. This approach is likely to be of interest to researchers in computational geometry (cs.CG), data structures (cs.DS), computer vision (cs.CV), graphics (cs.GR), and social and information networks (cs.SI) who are interested in analyzing and visualizing data.
